TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityMarkupSerializer extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 在设计时为 提供可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 序列化服务。

span.span: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 提供将活动类对象序列化为 XAML 格式和将 XAML 内容反序列化为活动类对象的方法。 provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects. 这些服务主要由活动设计器使用，用于在工作流设计图面上保留类。These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface. 有关序列化的详细信息，请参阅[序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453)。For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453).

span.span: The that manages the serialization process.

summary.span: 向 通知刚序列化了一个对象。

span.span: Notifies the that an object has just been serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 方法在 上运行并执行序列化后处理之后，立即调用 `obj`，主要用于设置 .xoml 文件中的代码和可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 的格式和缩进。 is called immediately after the method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.

span.span: The that manages the serialization process.

summary.span: 向 通知即将序列化对象。

span.span: Notifies the that an object is about to be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 方法即将在 指定的活动上运行之前，调用 `obj`。 is called immediately before the method runs on the activity specified by `obj`. 写入活动的开放可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 标记，包括任何必需的属性。 writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.

exception.span: 、 或 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: , , or contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
